paragraphs.zh-tw: ♫（音樂）♫動感爵士動感爵士就是1.現場循環樂段2. 即興爵士以及3. 手勢控制聲音的設計
paragraphs.en: (Music) Text: BeatJazz. BeatJazz is: 1. Live looping, 2. Jazz improvisation And 3. "Gestural" sound design.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 雙手各佩帶一個加速感應器來感應手上的動作不同的燈光顏色代表我在演奏不同的音源
paragraphs.en: Accelerometers on each hand read hand position. The color of the lights indicates which sound I am playing.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 紅色＝鼓藍色＝貝斯綠色＝和弦橙色＝主奏紫色＝合成音色吹口是由一個按鈕兩個吉他撥片和許多高溫固化膠組合而成
paragraphs.en: Red = Drums, Blue = Bass, Green = Chords, Orange = Leads, Purple = Pads The mouthpiece consists of ... a button, two guitar picks and lots of hot glue.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 抬頭顯示器是一個顯示系統參數的智慧型手機為甚麼？這為了將音樂文化變得簡而易懂如此便能在現場學習和萃取所有過去，現在和未來的音樂風格
paragraphs.en: The heads-up display is a smartphone that displays system parameters. Why? To atomize music culture so that ALL past, present and future genres can be studied and abstracted, live.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 以及讓動感爵士樂家們可以變得像音樂主持人一樣常見最主要的⋯⋯
paragraphs.en: And "BeatJazzers" become as common as D.J.'s. But mostly ...

paragraphs.zh-tw: 與其等待未來不如創造未來
paragraphs.en: to MAKE the future rather than wait for it.
